WhirlyGlobeViewControllerSimpleAnimationDelegate Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Conforms to WhirlyGlobeViewControllerAnimationDelegate
Declared in WhirlyGlobeViewController.h

Overview

The animation delegate support provides a lot of flexibility. This version just provides all the standard fields and interpolates from beginning to end.

– initWithState:

Initialize with an animation state to copy

- (id)initWithState:(WhirlyGlobeViewControllerAnimationState *)endState
